items.title: Crab Beignets
items.description: Savory Crab Beignets on a bed of Lemon Aïoli

items.title: Southern Garlic Cheese Bread
items.description: Fresh Basil, Mozzarella Cheese, Roasted Garlic, and Olive Oil

items.title: Gulf Coast Poutine Fries
items.description: French Fries, White Cheddar Cheese Curds, Gumbo Ya-Ya

items.title: Cajun Skillet Cornbread
items.description: Aged Cheddar, Green Onions, Honey Butter

items.title: Crispy Calamari
items.description: dusted with Korean Chili Flakes, served with Lemon Aïoli & Marinara dipping sauces

items.title: Fried Crawfish Lettuce Wraps
items.description: Buttermilk marinated La Crawfish Tails, Gem Butter Lettuce, Sweet Chili-Garlic sauce, Pickled Red Onions, Cilantro, Lime

items.title: Gumbo Ya-Ya
items.description: Andouille Sausage, Roasted Chicken, Trinity, simmered with Creole Seasonings in a rich, dark, Roux-thickened Broth, served over Green Onion Rice. [Entrée Portion - $27]

items.title: French Quarter Salad
items.description: Market Greens, Candied Pecans, Cherry Tomatoes, and Apple Cider Vinaigrette

items.title: Creole Caesar
items.description: Romaine, shaved Asiago, Garlicky Brioche Croutons, housemade Caesar

items.title: Creole Pasta Jambalaya
items.description: A Jazz Kitchen signature – Gulf Shrimp, Andouille Sausage, Roasted Chicken, Creole seasoning with Spinach Fettuccini

items.title: Crab & Shrimp Remoulade Roll
items.description: Spicy boiled Gulf Shrimp and lump Crabmeat tossed in JZK housemade remoulade sauce with Butter Lettuce, fresh Basil leaves and pickled Red Onions on a toasted Brioche roll

items.title: NOLA BBQ Gulf Shrimp & Grits
items.description: simmered in a New Orleans "BBQ Sauce" with Roasted Garlic, Lemon, Worcestershire, Creole Seasonings, Andouille Sausage, Parmesan Grits, blistered Cherry Tomatoes

items.title: Blackened Salmon*
items.description: Pacific Salmon, crispy Parmesan Grit Cake, Poblano Chili Cream Sauce, Mexican Street Corn

items.title: Bayou Bacon Smash Burger*
items.description: Aged Cheddar, Caramelized Onions, zesty Pickles, Thousand Island Dressing, Toasted Brioche Bun, French Fries

items.title: Grilled Chicken Caesar
items.description: Romaine, shaved Asiago, Garlicky Brioche Croutons, housemade Caesar. [Substitute Grilled Salmon for $30 or Grilled Shrimp for $28]

items.title: Green Goddess Salad
items.description: Romaine Hearts, Applewood-smoked Bacon, Granny Smith Apples, Cherry Tomatoes, Feta Cheese, Toasted Pumpkin Seeds, Green Goddess Dressing [Add Grilled Chicken for $5, Add 5 Large Grilled Shrimp for $10, Make It Vegetarian! Add a Grilled Portobello Mushroom *no bacon]

items.title: Coconut Crusted Gulf Shrimp
items.description: Pineapple scented Rice, Chili-Garlic Spiced Broccolini, Mango Beurre Blanc

items.title: CGP Fried Chicken
items.description: Buttermilk and Herb Marinated Fried Chicken Breast, Brazilian Black Beans, Jalapeño-bacon Potato Salad, Mango Hot Honey

items.title: Shrimp & Dumplings
items.description: Tail-on Gulf Shrimp, Potato Gnocchi, Oven-roasted Tomatoes, Pesto Cream Sauce, Shaved Asiago Cheese

items.title: Spicy Grilled Chicken “Macaroni & Cheese” Bowl
items.description: Penne, gooey smoked Gouda Cheese Sauce, roasted Broccolini, roasted Cherry Tomatoes, Applewood smoked Bacon and Brioche bread crumbs

items.title: Grilled New York Steak Chimichurri*
items.description: Rosemary Brown Sugar Roasted Sweet Potatoes, Broccolini, Red Wine reduction, Chimichurri Sauce [Reef & Beef It! Add Crabmeat for $12]

items.title: Grilled Medallions of Filet Mignon*
items.description: Crispy Brabant Potatoes tossed with Onions, seasonal Vegetables, Zinfandel reduction [Reef & Beef It! Add Crabmeat for $12]

items.title: French Bread
items.description: with Butter

items.title: Mac & Cheese
items.description: Penne, gooey Gouda Cheese sauce, Applewood Smoked Bacon, Parmesan. Choice of French Fries, Fresh Fruit or Carrot and Green Bean Medley.

items.title: Jazz Kitchen Smash Cheeseburger
items.description: On a Toasted Bun. Choice of French Fries, Fresh Fruit or Carrot and Green Bean Medley.

items.title: Grilled Medallion of Filet Mignon
items.description: 3oz Filet Mignon Medallion. Choice of French Fries, Fresh Fruit or Carrot and Green Bean Medley.

items.title: Grilled Gulf Shrimp
items.description: 5 total, grilled to perfection. Choice of French Fries, Fresh Fruit or Carrot and Green Bean Medley.

items.title: Crispy Chicken Tenders
items.description: served with Honey-Mustard dipping sauce. Choice of French Fries, Fresh Fruit or Carrot and Green Bean Medley.

items.title: Bananas Foster Glazed Beignets
items.description: Banana Rum Icing, Cinnamon-Sugar dust, Caramel drizzle, Vanilla Bean Crème Anglaise. 4 per order

items.title: Hot Classic Beignets
items.description: Our signature French Donuts topped generously with Powdered Sugar. 5 Per Order

items.title: Double Chocolate Bread Pudding
items.description: Semi-sweet Chocolate, White and Dark Chocolate Ganache. A la Mode for $2. Please allow 25 minutes to prepare

items.title: Abita Root Beer Float
items.description: A New Orleans Root Beer made with La Cane Sugar, topped with a generous scoop of Vanilla Bean Ice Cream

items.title: JZK Hurricane
items.description: Don Q Cristal Rum, Trader Vic's Dark Rum, Don Q 151 Float, Pineapple Juice, Orange Juice, Grenadine

items.title: Seasonal Old Fashioned
items.description: A new twist on an old favorite, featuring a unique taste of the season. Ask your server for details!

items.title: Chocolate Blackberry Mint Julep
items.description: Maker's Mark Bourbon, Muddled Blackberries, Angostura Chocolate Bitters, Housemade Mint Simple Syrup

items.title: Smoke & Pineapple
items.description: Del Maguey Vida Mezcal, Pineapple Juice, Angostura Bitters, Agave Nectar, Lime Juice

items.title: Shorebreak
items.description: Empress Gin, fresh Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Fee Foam

items.title: Praline Cold Brew Martini
items.description: Tito's Vodka, Mr. Black Cold Brew, Cold Brew Concentrate, Half & Half, Praline Syrup, Mini Glazed Beignet

items.title: PCH
items.description: Pineapple Vodka, Piña Colada mix, Bärenjäger Honey Liqueur

items.description: Van Gogh Açaí-Blueberry Vodka, Muddled Basil, Soda, Lemonade

Elysian Brewing Co., Space Dust IPA

items.description: Made with New Amsterdam Vodka and Real Fruit Juice. Grapefruit / Peach / Watermelon. 12oz can (ABV 4.5%)
